janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathata, niyojya amathya anuradha jayarathnata, madhyama parisara adhikariye hitapu sabhapathiwarayata erehiwa allas ho dushana wimarshana komishan sabhawa wetha paminili karana bawa bawa paribhogika ayithin surakime jathika wyaparaya pawasayi.
